exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q, r : list (Term A n) Hcanonp : olist (A:=A) ltM p /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p Hcanonq : olist (A:=A) ltM q /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) q Hcanonr : olist (A:=A) ltM r /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) r Unable to unify "{eqP ?M1842 ?M1843 ?M1845 (fst ?M1846) (snd ?M1846)} + {~ eqP ?M1842 ?M1843 ?M1845 (fst ?M1846) (snd ?M1846)}" with "eqP A eqA n (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a0 : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (p, q)) (snd (p, q)) a0) (plusp (p, q)), r)) (snd (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a0 : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (p, q)) (snd (p, q)) a0) (plusp (p, q)), r)) a) (plusp (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (p, q)) (snd (p, q)) a) (plusp (p, q)), r))) (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (p, projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a0 : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (q, r)) (snd (q, r)) a0) (plusp (q, r)))) (snd (p, projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a0 : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (q, r)) (snd (q, r)) a0) (plusp (q, r)))) a) (plusp (p, projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (q, r)) (snd (q, r)) a) (plusp (q, r)))))".

original: intros p q r Hcanonp Hcanonq Hcanonr. unfold canonical in Hcanonp, Hcanonq, Hcanonr. unfold pluspf. rewrite pluspf3_assoc. apply eqPf. - apply plusP_com. + apply plusP_uniq_eqP with p q. * apply pluspf_inv1_eqa. auto. * apply pluspf_inv2_eqa. auto. + apply plusP_uniq_eqP with q p. * apply pluspf_inv2_eqa. auto. * apply pluspf_inv1_eqa. auto. - apply plusP_com. + apply plusP_uniq_eqP with (pluspf p q) r. * apply pluspf_inv2_eqa. auto. * apply pluspf_inv3a. apply eqT_refl. apply zeroP_plusTermr. auto. + apply plusP_uniq_eqP with (pluspf q r) p. * apply pluspf_inv2_eqa. auto. * apply pluspf_inv3a. apply eqT_sym. apply eqT_refl. apply zeroP_plusTerml. auto.
